newsitem.title: CHINA: China hikes diesel price to 1,990 yuan a tonne.
newsitem.headline: China hikes diesel price to 1,990 yuan a tonne.

text.p: China raised the ex-refinery price for diesel to 1,990 yuan per tonne from 1,900 yuan effective from Friday, an official of state refiner SINOPEC said.
"We have already issued a document," the official of China National Petro-Chemical Corporation (SINOPEC) said by telephone.
"The price change takes effect today and is an increase of 90 yuan," he said.
